mapper.select: select id,company_name companyName,person_name personName,id_number idNumber,phone,totalCount,pass,bad,risk,audit,refuse, create_time createTime,update_time updateTime from t_result_count_base a where not exists (select * from t_result_count_base b where a.company_name = b.company_name and a.create_time < create_time ) and company_name = #{companyName}
